document_data.name: Aumry's cloak
document_data.mainbody: '''Aumry's cloak''' was the cloak of [[Aumry]], lord of [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.Powers: The cloak had the powers of a ''[[cloak of charisma]]''.
document_data.History: Aumry's cloak rested in [[Aumry's Tomb]] in [[Watcher's Knoll]] in Shadowdale.
